fields.description: Claude API key for document processing. Get your API key from https://console.anthropic.com/
fields.label: Anthropic API Key

fields.description: Claude model to use for field extraction
fields.label: Claude Model

fields.description: Field mappings for Motor Policy extraction (alias → fieldname). You can edit this JSON directly to customize field mapping.
fields.label: Motor Policy Fields

fields.description: Field mappings for Health Policy extraction (alias → fieldname). You can edit this JSON directly to customize field mapping.
fields.label: Health Policy Fields

fields.description: Last time field mappings were synchronized with DocType definitions
fields.label: Last Field Sync

fields.description: Refresh field mappings from Motor Policy and Health Policy DocTypes
fields.label: Refresh Field Mappings

fields.description: Cached dynamic extraction prompt for motor policies (auto-generated from Motor Policy DocType)
fields.label: Motor Extraction Prompt

fields.description: Cached dynamic extraction prompt for health policies (auto-generated from Health Policy DocType)
fields.label: Health Extraction Prompt

fields.description: Last time extraction prompts were refreshed
fields.label: Last Prompt Sync

fields.description: Refresh extraction prompts from Motor Policy and Health Policy DocTypes
fields.label: Refresh Extraction Prompts

fields.description: Maximum time in seconds for processing jobs (60-600)
fields.label: Timeout (seconds)

fields.description: Queue type for background processing: short (< 5 min), default (< 30 min), long (> 30 min)
fields.label: Queue Type
